info.name: Book of the Fallen - Custom Armors
info.description: Contains Custom Swords created specifically for the campaign "Book of the Fallen".

description.p: The shield is emblazoned with a strange depection of a slender crowned woman, possibly a half elf, with golden hair, encompassed by two skulls of some type of beast. The image is engraved and inlayed with golden leaf.
While holding this shield, you have:

ul.li: When the bearer is reduced to bellow 20 HP he may be healed with Proficiency Bonus x d12 HP on a raw d20 roll of 15 and above. During this effect the woman on the shield opens her eyes and golden streams of Magical Energy surround the bearer.
